feature_model.name: Insurance_Product

meta.data: Feature model of an simple insurance product

Bedir Tekinerdogan and Mehmet Aksit. Managing variability in product line scoping using design space models. Proceedings of Software Variability Management Workshop, Gronin-gen, IWI 2003-7-01, The Netherlands, pages 5â€“12, 2003.

feature_model.feature_tree: :r insurance_product1 :m insured_object2 :g [1,1] : corporation (corporation) : realty4 : movable_property (movable_property) : person (person) :m coverage7 :g [1,*] : illness (illness) : life9 : unemployment10 : damage (damage) : loss (loss) :m payment13 :g [1,1] : service14 : ammount15 :o own_risk16 :m conditions17 :m acceptance18 :m exception19 :m premium20 :g [1,1] : direct21 : periodical22 :m payee23 :g [1,*] : person224 : payee_corporation (payee_corporation)
feature_model.constraints: c1: ~corporation or ~illness c2: ~person or ~damage c3: ~loss or movable_property c4: ~corporation or payee_corporation
